headline: L3Harris Technologies (NYSE:LHX) Advances with New 3ATI Display in F-16 Viper Shield System
summary: L3Harris Technologies (NYSE:LHX) advanced by 17% last quarter, potentially linked to the company's entry into production with IEE for the 3ATI Electric Warfare Multi-Function Displays after successful integration tests. Strong sales figures for the first quarter and notable share buybacks also likely bolstered investor confidence. Additionally, L3Harris's strategic expansions and new contracts, such as a significant agreement in Germany and with the Dutch Ministry of Defence, complemented...
